entry.title: Téléphèrique du Brévent
entry.content:
Claude Jenkins posted a photo:

From the left : Aiguille du Midi, Mont-Blanc du Tacul, Mont Maudit and the King Mont-Blanc !

entry.title: Parapente au Brévent.
entry.content:
Claude Jenkins posted a photo:

The Brévent, named after the hight and vertical cliff where arrive the cable car in the picture, is a place of Chamonix Mont-Blanc world famous for Paragliding, Wingsuit, Base-jump, Climbing and Hiking, Ski- extreme or not- Ski-touring....
